raw_body: MAHINDA BANDARA WARAKAULLE – It is with deep sorrow that we mourn the loss of MAHINDA BANDARA WARAKAULLE. He will be lovingly remembered by his wife Bernadette,​ his two children Dilenthi and Keshan,​ his son-in-law Jeff,​ daughter-in-law Niranga,​ his three beautiful grandchildren Keara,​ Jia and Manit. He was the beloved son of Chandradasa and Anula Warakaulle (deceased),​ loving brother of Sorani Perera,​ Monica Athureliya and Damayanthi Perera,​ brother-in-law to Nimal Perera and a much loved uncle to Shanath,​ Dulshan,​ Prasadini,​ Piyumali and Shanilka. Words cannot express how much he will be missed. May he attain the Supreme Bliss of Nibbana !057953
